abstract: Brazilian broadcaster Jose Margulies is the only one of 14 FIFA officials indicted in May on corruptions charges to remain free; Brazil has begun its own inquiry, but it may take at least a year to complete.
lead_paragraph: José Margulies, 75, a Brazilian broadcaster, is the only one of 14 people indicted in May to remain free. Brazil has begun its own inquiry, but it may take at least a year to complete.

headline.main: Brazilian Implicated in FIFA Case Remains Free, Unlike Many Others
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Implicated in FIFA Case Remains Free, Unlike Many Others

snippet: José Margulies, 75, a Brazilian broadcaster, is the only one of 14 people indicted in May to remain free. Brazil has begun its own inquiry, but it may take at least a year to complete.
